Text: O̩jo̩ meji jo̩ fa-i, i aje̩ ñw a muye;
Awa ki ma, awa ki tʼo̩ ubi alo kʼa fu Jihofa ma;
Todule̩ oñ omi nʼamakache̩ fʼuma lo̩ wane̩,
Todu ufe̩de̩nyo̩ chʼe̩wñ ki rʼumi e̩do̩,
Ama muda fʼalo-mi daba dab Ade̩m;
Gilead chʼewo abo kuma ache ibe̩te̩,
Alu amadinya kpala jo̩ anede one̩,
Omi la fʼe̩wñ omefa li ef unyi Israe̩l;
Uwe̩ ge̩, O Juda, o̩jo̩ e̩wñ-we̩ eko wʼunyi chʼe̩date̩ ñw e̩ me̩.
